node.html: Swift DI is a dependency Injection framework inspired by Java (Spring Dependency Injection).
An app that transforms from a physical wallet to a digital wallet to keep thousands of name cards.
A backend project for creating API and mange data for the NameCardIOS project.
A system that receives all phone calls based on configuration. Auto-assign each phone call to the operator. The system is built on top of Twilio.
The app is the first online travel agency (OTA) in Cambodia, you can book accommodations and activity packages with online payment.
An App for specific organizations called UYFC allows users to create events, plan events, invite members, and register attendance through a QR code or phone number.
An App that helps you to manage guests, expenses, gifts, and especially quickly register gifts from the guests.
The first online travel agency (OTA) platform in Cambodia, specifically designed for locals to effortlessly book accommodations and activity packages.
An App that allows users to learn Japanese by themself. The main target user is Cambodian.
A platform that keeps tracking real-time of employee's attendances. And employees can request advance salary based on their attendances anytime.
A system that was developed for auto writing reviews on Airbnb.com based on users that guest checkout room. It also auto login to Book.com to check unread messages and alert to operator.
A #1 platform on Job Service for Cambodia low skill people to work in JAPAN and provide 100% scholarship.
An App that allows users to order food first and then come to eat or pick it up later.
An app allows you to store unlimited e-cards, coupons, loyalty cards, boarding passes and more on your Android phone.
An app that allows users to reserve doctors, keep all medical records history, schedule the next reservation, and provide stamps for loyalty customers.
An app that gives points to users when they share and like a page on Facebook. Those points can be exchanged for different types of gifts like coupons, discounts, and equipment.

Efficiently compute loans in Amortization, Mortgage, Agriculture, and Flat Rate Installment with our user-friendly calculator. Save detailed loan information, including schedules, in PDF format or share them effortlessly via email, Skype, SMS, and more.
An app that allows users to get the latest Korean music songs, and songs with subtitles and support their idol.
An app that allows users to receive the latest news from GRK organization.
An app that allows downloading 360 videos from a server to view locally on mobile for visual tourists in Japan.
Tablecross is free social contribution gourmet restaurant reservation application. Every time you make a reservation with our app, we will donate to children in developing countries.
An app that allows users to get the latest news about scholarships and events.
